name: Stellar Media Works
tag_list: videos, commercials, video-games, flash, multimedia, graphic-design, social-media, mobile-apps, app-development, media, audio-engineering, website, web-design, production
overview:
StellarMediaWorks, LLC is a multimedia and marketing firm that provides clients and business an all inclusive package of services from social media to interactive video games to assist them in their business endeavours.

StellarMediaWorks, LLC is a full service multimedia production outfit that specializes in 7 main cores of creative production and design:

-Social Media -Mobile Application Development -Flash Video Games -TV and Video Pre & Post Production -Web Design -Printed Media Design -Audio Production & Engineering
